comment._content: She hasn't changed much! Nice shot!

comment._content: Nice Action Photo. Nice looking Athletes now 20 years flew by for them - - -

comment.author: 40708286@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/55597723@N02] And for us, a sobering thought.

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: I remember that! Not the opening of the Phoenix Park but the race that Sonia ran in that year.  She was flying and put many fine male athletes far behind her.  Great shot and a terrific way to remind us of the bounty that the Park has proven to be for people down through the centuries!

comment.author: 8087163@N05
comment._content: Great shot of one of my favourite athletes!

comment.author: 34151465@N00
comment._content: Later that year she was just edged out of the medals at the Barcelona Olympics- 4th in the 3000m at the age of 22
